entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
